benchmark_details.name: A BENCHMARK AND EVALUATION FOR REAL-WORLD OUT-OF-DISTRIBUTION DETECTION USING VISION-LANGUAGE MODELS
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces three novel out-of-distribution (OOD) detection benchmarks: ImageNet-X, ImageNet-FS-X, and Wilds-FS-X, designed to evaluate model performance under challenging semantic and covariate shifts, reflecting real-world conditions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide challenging and practical evaluations of OOD detection methods to support a precise understanding of model characteristics.

data.size: 25,000 images for ImageNet-X, 5,000 images for ImageNet-FS-X, varied for Wilds-FS-X

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on performance comparisons across different OOD detection methods.
methodology.interpretation: Higher AUROC values indicate better OOD detection performance.
